title: Easy Anatomy 3D 17+
subtitle: 3D Atlas, Flashcards, Videos
appDescription: With the Easy Anatomy mobile app, you're guaranteed to learn anatomy easier and faster. The app includes the following features: 3D atlas: Discover a 3D atlas of the next level in our app. Our 3D atlas uses the most accurate and comprehensive 3D model of the human body. Each anatomical system is broken down into layers so that you can study the structure of the human body in as much detail as possible. We have focused on smooth operation and user-friendly interface. Over 10,000 Flashcards: Our team of illustrators has done a tremendous job drawing all the human anatomical systems. The app contains over 10,000 flashcards with illustrations that can be used for quick and effective memorization of anatomy. You can take various flashcard tests to check your knowledge. Study notes: Our team of experts has written over 500 comprehensive notes. They present information in a unique way using clear diagrams, mind maps, and notes without unnecessary details and academic jargon. Videos: Engaging, concise, and with a distinctive approach to presenting material, our videos simplify the understanding of all aspects of human anatomy. Watching our videos is a pleasure: they're narrated by a professional actor, making learning an enjoyable experience. Other app features: — Tests; — Creating your own flashcards and quizzes on any topic. We believe that an app dedicated to exploring the human body should mirror its beauty and elegance. Discover anatomy anew, download Easy Anatomy right now! The app contains the following subscription options: - Monthly ($14.99) with a 3-day free trial period. Price may vary by location. - Yearly ($99.99). Price may vary by location. After the 3 days free trial monthly subscription automatically renews for $14.99 (price may vary by location) per month unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the trial period. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost for the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when purchasing a premium subscription during the free trial period. Privacy Policy: https://easyanatomyapp.com/privacy-policy/ Terms of Service: https://easyanatomyapp.com/terms-of-use/ Contact: support@easyanatomy.ru more

reviews.title: Great app for students
reviews.review: I am currently in a&p and these quizzes are helping me memorize the names of the bones. So helpful! The only thing I would say it’s not worth the money each month. There are other apps that are free that are just like this one. Also I don’t like the colors on the bones it confuses me at times. more

reviews.title:
Misleading

    Developer Response
reviews.review: It’s kind of helpful looking at the 3D model to study the bones and landmarks but it doesn’t show all of the ones I need to know and it uses different names for some of them. I don’t think it’s worth the money. I did the yearly subscription which showed that I could pay 8 dollars per month which would total yo about 100 dollars a year. I was just charged 100 dollars outright instead of 8 dollars a month. This is really upsetting because I feel as tho I have been misinformed with my subscription and I am a college student who does not have to finances to pay that outright. There are other apps that will be more worth your time that are free. more Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We’re sorry to hear that your experience hasn’t fully met your expectations, and we’d like to address your concerns. First, regarding the 3D models, we take great pride in offering one of the most detailed and anatomically accurate models available, especially when compared to free alternatives. Our team of experts works hard to ensure that the models are comprehensive and precise, but we understand that there may be certain terms or landmarks that differ from what you're used to. If you could provide specific examples, we’d be happy to address this and improve your learning experience further. Regarding the subscription charge, we understand how frustrating this can be. Our yearly subscription is set up to offer a discounted rate for the full year, which is why it’s billed upfront at $100 rather than in monthly installments. We apologize if this wasn’t clear during the purchase process. As a college student, we want to ensure that Easy Anatomy remains accessible to you, and we'd be happy to look into possible solutions, such as adjusting your plan or issuing a partial refund. Please don’t hesitate to reach out so we can resolve this issue and ensure Easy Anatomy continues to support your studies effectively. We truly value your business and your feedback. Best regards, The Easy Anatomy Team more

reviews.title: Not letting me move on
reviews.review: Hi I really love this app but every time I try to learn or take test the skeleton thing keeps coming up I don’t know if that’s a glitch but I physically can’t move on and I keep having to restart please let me know how this problem can be fixed more

languages: English, French, German, Russian, Simplified Chinese
